CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Polymer solar cells with a device configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al were fabricated and characterized under the illumination of AM1.5G ( 100 mW / cm^2 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate)
3. polymer: Unspecified type of polymer
4. PC71BM: Poly[2-methoxy-5-(2-ethylhexyloxy)-1,4-phenylenevinylene]
5. LiF: Lithium Fluoride
6. Al: Aluminum.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate)
3. polymer: Unspecified polymer (if the context implies that only certain polymers are relevant, please provide the specific polymer name)
4. PC71BM: Poly[2-methoxy-5-(2-ethylhexyloxy)-1,4-phenylenevinylene]
5. LiF: Lithium Fluoride.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Indium Tin Oxide (ITO) |
| Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate) (PEDOT : PSS) |
| Unspecified polymer (if applicable) |
| Poly[2-methoxy-5-(2-ethylhexyloxy)-1,4-phenylenevinylene] (PC71BM) |
| Lithium Fluoride (LiF) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Polymer solar cells with a device configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al were fabricated and characterized under the illumination of AM1.5G ( 100 mW / cm^2 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate)
3. polymer: Unspecified type of polymer used in the solar cell
4. PC71BM: Poly[2-methoxy-5-(2-ethylhexyloxy)-1,4-phenylenevinylene]
5. LiF: Lithium Fluoride
6. Al: Aluminum.

These are the identified "Property Name" entities in the given paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide (transparent conductive layer)
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate) (hole transporting material)
3. polymer: Unspecified type of polymer (active layer in solar cell)
4. PC71BM: Poly[2-methoxy-5-(2-ethylhexyloxy)-1,4-phenylenevinylene] (electron transporting material)
5. LiF: Lithium Fluoride (electron transporting material and window layer)

These are the identified Material Property entities in the given paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Indium Tin Oxide (ITO) |
| Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene): Poly(styrenesulfonate) (PEDOT : PSS) |
| Unspecified type of polymer |
| Poly[2-methoxy-5-(2-ethylhexyloxy)-1,4-phenylenevinylene] (PC71BM) |
| Lithium Fluoride (LiF) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Polymer solar cells with a device configuration of ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polymer : PC71BM / LiF / Al were fabricated and characterized under the illumination of AM1.5G ( 100 mW / cm^2 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide, a type of conductive material used as a transparent electrode in the solar cell.
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate), a conducting polymer used as a hole transporting layer in the solar cell.
3. polymer : PC71BM: A specific type of polymer used as the active layer in the solar cell, which functions as an electron transporting material.
4. LiF: Lithium Fluoride, a compound used as a source of lithium ions in the solar cell.
5. Al: Aluminum, a metal used as the back contact or back electrode in the solar cell.
6. AM1.5G: A standard solar spectrum representing the intensity distribution of sunlight reaching the Earth's surface.
7. 100 mW / cm^2: The intensity of the AM1.5G solar spectrum used during the characterization of the solar cells.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide - Transparent conductive material
2. PEDOT : PSS: Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate) - Conducting polymer
3. polymer : PC71BM - Specific type of polymer
4. LiF - Compound, source of lithium ions
5. 100 mW / cm^2 - Solar intensity.

These entities represent the material properties or values used in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Indium Tin Oxide (ITO) |
| Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene):poly(styrenesulfonate) (PEDOT : PSS) |
| Specific type of polymer : PC71BM |
| Lithium Fluoride (LiF) |
| 100 mW / cm^2 |
